project.html:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8" />
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1" />
  <title>p5.js WEBGL Soft Gradient Planes — Breathing Layers</title>
  <style>
    html, body { margin: 0; padding: 0; background: #ffffff; }
    canvas { display: block; margin: 0 auto; }
  </style>
</head>
<body>

  <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/p5@1.9.4/lib/p5.min.js"></script>

  <script>
    let colors = [];
    let shapes = [];  // Store the shapes' parameters

    function setup() {

      // ----------------------------------------------------
      // seed override system
      // ----------------------------------------------------
      let manualSeed = null;   // ← use this seed; set to null for randomness again

      let seed = (manualSeed !== null)
                 ? manualSeed
                 : floor(random(1_000_000_000));

      console.log("Seed:", seed);
      randomSeed(seed);
      // ----------------------------------------------------

      pixelDensity(6);
      createCanvas(1000, 1000, WEBGL);
      colorMode(HSB, 360, 100, 100, 100); // alpha max = 100

      colors = [
        [color(0, 100, 100, 30), color(45, 100, 100, 30)],     // Red → Yellow
        [color(180, 100, 100, 30), color(240, 100, 100, 30)],  // Cyan → Blue
        [color(300, 100, 100, 30), color(60, 100, 100, 30)]    // Magenta → Yellow
      ];

      // Create overlapping, perfectly centered shapes
      // Each layer gets its own breathing phase + speed so they "breathe by layer"
      for (let j = 0; j < 6; j++) {
        let w = random(30, 820);
        let h = random(30, 820);

        shapes.push({
          w,
          h,
          colorSet: random(colors),

          // breathing params (per-layer)
          baseA1: 30,
          baseA2: 30,
          amp: random(10, 22),                 // how much alpha changes
          speed: random(0.004, 0.012),         // per-layer speed
          phase: random(TWO_PI)                // per-layer offset
        });
      }
    }

    function draw() {
      background(255);

      for (let i = 0; i < shapes.length; i++) {
        let shape = shapes[i];

        // Per-layer "breathing" alpha: 0..1..0 (smooth)
        let t = frameCount * shape.speed + shape.phase;
        let breathe01 = 0.5 + 0.5 * sin(t);            // 0..1
        let a = shape.baseA1 + shape.amp * breathe01;  // base..base+amp

        let c1 = shape.colorSet[0];
        let c2 = shape.colorSet[1];

        // Keep the exact same colors; only override alpha per layer
        let c1b = color(hue(c1), saturation(c1), brightness(c1), a);
        let c2b = color(hue(c2), saturation(c2), brightness(c2), a);

        push();
        drawSoftGradientPlane(0, 0, shape.w, shape.h, c1b, c2b);
        pop();
      }
    }

    // Draw centered rectangle with vertical gradient using vertex colors
    function drawSoftGradientPlane(x, y, w, h, c1, c2) {
      noStroke();
      beginShape();
      fill(c1);
      vertex(-w / 2, -h / 2, 0);
      fill(c2);
      vertex(w / 2, -h / 2, 0);
      vertex(w / 2,  h / 2, 0);
      vertex(-w / 2,  h / 2, 0);
      endShape(CLOSE);
    }
  </script>
</body>
</html>
